resources.string: Sign Up for a new account
Road.Ai is world\'s first real-time road condition monitoring app based on artificial inteligence. \nSo let\'s get started, if you are a new user signup, it\'s free!

RoadAI is the world's first social media app that allows you to have real-time road condition/road distress updates from crowd sourced data.
Equipped with state of the art AI engine it automatically detects road distresses.
The coin system let's you earn while travelling which can be redeemed in the marketplace. Level up your detection game,
invite your friends, build a community.
